Nick's Blog

Seeing double

10 January 2006

Today has been quite the busy one. I'm in San Jose and got word not too long ago that today the folks over at Apple announced a dual core intel powerbook. Wow. There were lots of predictions about intel ibooks and bigger displays, but nothing like this. I guess its safe to say that if you are going to go, Go Big.

I'm listening to the keynote and will make my speculations very soon.
